SEARCH
Package ru.nsu.peyuaa

Class Pizzeria

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.peyuaa.Pizzeria
public class Pizzeria extends Object
The Pizzeria class represents a pizzeria where orders can be made and fulfilled. This class manages a set of bakers, couriers, and a warehouse where pizzas are baked, stored, and picked up for delivery.

      Throws:

    • getWarehouse

      public Warehouse getWarehouse()
      Gets the warehouse used by this pizzeria.
      Returns:
      the warehouse

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the pizzeria operation by initializing and starting the bakers, couriers, and warehouse threads. This method should be called after setting the bakers and couriers lists and starting the pizzeria thread. Once the pizzeria is open, it will continuously listen for new orders from the customers and add them to the orders queue until the program is terminated.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the pizzeria operation by interrupting the threads of all bakers and couriers.
